connector.description: A Kamelet that can produce events to an Apache ActiveMQ Classic message broker using JMS

camel.kamelet.jms-apache-activemq-sink.d.name: camel.kamelet.jms-apache-activemq-sink.destinationType
camel.kamelet.jms-apache-activemq-sink.d.description: The JMS destination type (i.e.: queue or topic)

camel.kamelet.jms-apache-activemq-sink.d.name: camel.kamelet.jms-apache-activemq-sink.destinationName
camel.kamelet.jms-apache-activemq-sink.d.description: The JMS destination name Example: person

camel.kamelet.jms-apache-activemq-sink.p.name: camel.kamelet.jms-apache-activemq-sink.password
camel.kamelet.jms-apache-activemq-sink.p.description: Target AMQ Broker password Example: password1!

camel.kamelet.jms-apache-activemq-sink.u.name: camel.kamelet.jms-apache-activemq-sink.username
camel.kamelet.jms-apache-activemq-sink.u.description: Target AMQ Broker Username Example: userName
